layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x95
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x95
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x64
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 278x18
          text run at (0,0) width 278: "There should be a green vertical bar below:"

        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 105x30 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 15x15
            text run at (0,0) width 15: "x"
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 15x15
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,15) size 15x15
              text run at (0,15) width 15: "x"
          LayoutText {#text} at (75,15) size 15x15
